overview: In KNOCKED OUT, JERKED OFF 2 (KOJO 2) videographer Jack Miller continues his hands-on exploration of naked male bodies, videotaping more sessions with straight young men who've taken basic "knock-out" pills and given Miller permission to do what he will with them while they sleep. The camerawork is crude--it's just Miller and the unconscious dudes; Miller holds the camera one-handed while he strips the guys and runs his other hand all over them--but the results, when he gets the cumshot and even when he doesn't, are fuckin' hot.
title: Knocked Out Jerked Off 2
